functions.description: Search for products that match a given substring. Try =CONTOSO.MOVIESEARCH("https://www.justwatch.com/us/movie/the-matrix", false).
functions.name: MOVIESEARCH

parameters.description: The string to search for in the sample JSON data.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Define whether the search should be a match of the whole product name or part of the product name. If omitted, completeMatch = false.
parameters.name: completeMatch

functions.description: Search for products that match a given substring. Try =CONTOSO.MOVIESEARCH2("https://www.justwatch.com/us/movie/tar-2022").
functions.name: MOVIESEARCH2

parameters.description: The string to search for in the sample JSON data.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Define whether the search should be a match of the whole product name or part of the product name. If omitted, completeMatch = false.
parameters.name: completeMatch
